Adding to my 2 faves today, $BCTX and $BRGO  
 
$BCTX - It takes time to come to brings drug to market. Taking advantage of this dip, which I feel is mostly due to retail impatience.  Company is well funded and CEO has brought 11 drugs to FDA approval. Now we have an FDA fast track 
 
$BRGO -Mkt cap under $3m. Had 11m in 2021 revenue (audited financials too, rare for an OTC to audit its fins). Net profit in most recent qrtr. Legit competitive advantage via factories in Armenia and Singapore that make for impressive gross margins 
 
We can reasonably expect $BRGO revenue to continue growing cuz the 2 subs were acquired mid-year 2021, in 2022-we'll have them full year. Also recently did an NFT pre-launch trial to just gauge demand and killed it. Theyll scale that up. (Is there any ticker that checks all these boxes w a mkt cap under $3M? Even $9m?) 
 
Also been adding $KLIC - impressive buy-back plan. And $AVGO (semiconductors wont stay down forever)
$AVGO dang those bond rates just keep rising. killing the market. I don't see a slowdown anytime soon. This week going to suck.
